info.author: Matt Halstead
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

Kupu checks the user-agent header in requests as part of
isKupuEnabled. If user-agent is empty then it will return false. This
is not so useful in those situations where it is nice to clear out
user agent, e.g. with nginx in front of squid.

This patch removes that check. So far it seems pretty stable to
inflict kupu on people without the user-agent data.

(A similar patch has already been applied to Products.TinyMCE.)

Changelog
=========

1.2 (2009-12-16)
----------------

- Fix packaging problem. Would not install due to missing docs.


1.1
---

- TinyMCE patch now part of TinyMCE so no longer needed.


1.0
---

- Initial release
info.name: ely.kupu_useragent_patch
info.summary: remove user agent test from the test for isKupuEnabled
info.html_description:
Introduction

Kupu checks the user-agent header in requests as part of isKupuEnabled. If user-agent is empty then it will return false. This is not so useful in those situations where it is nice to clear out user agent, e.g. with nginx in front of squid.

This patch removes that check. So far it seems pretty stable to inflict kupu on people without the user-agent data.

(A similar patch has already been applied to Products.TinyMCE.)

Changelog

1.2 (2009-12-16)

  • Fix packaging problem. Would not install due to missing docs.

1.1

  • TinyMCE patch now part of TinyMCE so no longer needed.

1.0

  • Initial release
